## LineMarkerTechnique interface

Runtime representation of \[\[LineMarkerStyle\]\] as parsed by \[\[StyleSetEvaluator\]\]. For technique parameters see \[\[MarkerTechniqueParams\]\].

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface LineMarkerTechnique extends MakeTechniqueAttrs<MarkerTechniqueParams> 
```
